# MTLReadWriteTextureTier.tier2

**Case**

Indicates the system supports tier 2 read-write textures.

## Declaration

```swift
case tier2
```

## Discussion

Tier 2 read-write textures support the following pixel formats (in addition to [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLReadWriteTextureTier/tier1]):

- [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLPixelFormat/rgba32Float]
- [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLPixelFormat/rgba32Uint]
- [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLPixelFormat/rgba32Sint]
- [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLPixelFormat/rgba16Float]
- [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLPixelFormat/rgba16Uint]
- [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLPixelFormat/rgba16Sint]
- [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLPixelFormat/rgba8Unorm]
- [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLPixelFormat/rgba8Uint]
- [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLPixelFormat/rgba8Sint]
- [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLPixelFormat/r16Float]
- [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLPixelFormat/r16Uint]
- [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLPixelFormat/r16Sint]
- [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLPixelFormat/r8Unorm]
- [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLPixelFormat/r8Uint]
- [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLPixelFormat/r8Sint]

## Enumeration cases

- **MTLReadWriteTextureTier.tier1**: Indicates the system supports tier 1 read-write textures.
- **MTLReadWriteTextureTier.tierNone**: Indicates the system doesn’t support read-write textures.
